website_summaries.verdict: If you aren’t turned off by its questionable social-sharing features, the advanced BACtrack Mobile Breathalyzer is a compelling tool that can help minimize overindulging.
pros: The BACtrack Mobile Breathalyzer measures your BAC with professional-grade fuel cell technology and estimates how long before you’re sober
It's compact and syncs via Bluetooth with iPhones and has a companion app
cons: In order to save readings you must store them in the cloud
The BACtrack's social-media features share way too much

customer_reviews.title: Good news, Big Brother is collecting data on your drinking
customer_reviews.text: This breathalyzer only works through connection to their proprietary app. Once you connect they are collecting information about you and selling it to third parties. It says so in the manual. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Junior Junior

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for peace of mind if you live with an alcoholic
customer_reviews.text: it works amazingly and it has stopped arguements of whether or not someone is drunk in my house. I can't tell you how much gaslighting this has saved me from if you live in an alcoholic who likes to pretend you're insane rather than then them being drunk this is a time saver
customer_reviews.author: Bedtime79

customer_reviews.title: I know drink way less and feel way better after a weekend out
customer_reviews.text: This has actually changed my life. I drink way less, now that I know how off my idea of “drunk” compares to reality. The app asks you to guess your BAC before you blow, so you’re almost forced to compare reality to your perception. I know drink way less and feel way better after a weekend out. Sincerely and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Schwind

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this companies products. Had their more expensive model, the S80, which stopped working a couple of months ago. Last night this little one was measuring impossibly high (0.37) on a few different people. Pretty sure they would be dead with that kind of BAC. Obviously this thing cannot be trusted, therefor it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who enjoys a drink should own a good breathalyzer
customer_reviews.text: I keep this thing charged and in my truck at all times. I use this all the time on the weekends and can't be happier with my purchase. It's pretty scary when you feel completely fine and you blow a 0.10. Can't say for certain it helped me avoid a DUI, but I can say it has prevented me from getting behind the wheel on multiple occasions. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Liberman

customer_reviews.title: Boys in college sometime drink
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my sons that are in college. I wanted them to be smart and responsible. I feel providing them with the tools might help them stay safe. This product works great and my boys use it and so do their friends. I am not sure if it has saved any lives but I feel better knowing that it is helping my boys make good choices.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R.

customer_reviews.title: Seems accurate but the connection between the unit and phone is finicky and unstable. The app is old and clunky.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work pretty well but it's finicky as hell to get it to actually connect to my phone. I have an android pixel 2 and usually I have to turn on the unit, walk around my house holding my phone until I find 'the magic spot' where it connects. Stand there and blow. The app is just wonky as hell frankly and it's clunky to use. I haven't really had any chance to test the accuracy if there is alcohol in my system but it does accurately record zero.
customer_reviews.author: Jmar8196

customer_reviews.title: this is a great and handy breathalyzer
customer_reviews.text: While it might not be as accurate as a police officer's, this is a great and handy breathalyzer. Small enough to pocket and take anywhere you're gonna be having drinks, pretty quick results (under 1m). The app lets you know how long 'til you're sober, which is also good. Don't risk DUIs; get this sucker and keep you and your friends safe. Also doubles as a fun party game? hah.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion after drinking!!
customer_reviews.text: What a product!!! I used to use a digital breath analyzer and then saw this and thought of trying it. It’s pricey for sure but the results are awesome. Super easy to connect and use. Just turn on, download the app BACtrack and you are ready to go. Open the app and turn on the anaylzer. The analyzer connects to the app via bluetooth. I tried testing with this and also my old device and found that old device was way off in its measurement. The app keeps a history of previous readings and also connects with health data.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this! To help my friends & me. First off, the app kept crashing, and then it took a long time to get it going to test. Basically everything was very delayed. I followed the directions (wait 15mins after drinking) but after one seltzer it said I was intoxicated and can't drive... I did it again 15 minutes later just in case it was because it was my first few times of using.. nope. Same thing. Very inaccurate & on something like this with so much it cost, 100% not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: The BAC tracker is super simple to set up and use through the app. It is very small which is awesome if you want to bring it with. Although it’s very lightweight it comes with a carrying case so I don’t think durability will be an issue. The reading seem to be consistent going up and down as they should after drinks (and when you stop drinking). I will update When I have the opportunity to test results against another breath test unit. So far I think this unit is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without it if you’re going drinking!
customer_reviews.text: This breathalyzer is very small and you can take it with you when you go out to make sure you’re under the legal limit to drive. It hold a charge for a very long time and you read your blood alcohol level through the application on your phone. It’s best to not drink 15 minutes before you take your reading and Take two or three readings in a row to make sure you get an accurate reading. For the price, it is a great deal and I don’t go out without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and logs all my readings into my iphone using ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and logs all my readings into my iphone using the iphone native Health app. wish i could easily print the log but the work around is taking screen shots and saving them. The replaceable mouth piece is only held in by friction, so having some spares is helpful but definitely always keep the tester in its case between uses. I test every hour or two while awake as part of a recovery promise to family and to rebuild trust. I have had a temporary ignition interlock system installed on my car and the BACtrack is a very useful precautionary tool to prevent violations from false positives like tooth rinses (ACT) which can produce a violation level reading.
customer_reviews.author: LolaTwain

customer_reviews.title: Tired of cops taking your license?
customer_reviews.text: Tired of the PoPo taking ur car when youre just trying to get home? look no further. Tip a few back and be good to drive home without going to jail. Its pretty accurate. But of course dont drive if it says ur above that limit. Thats just stupid. But this thing has gotten me alot of free drinks by playing "whoever blows the lowest buys a round!" yeah youre welcome.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent output but great design
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. There is some inconsistent outputs though. You will need to try multiple times and use the average it seem. One thing I also find annoying is that for some reason you have to turn on your GPS locations services to use the device. Other than those two issues, good small product that's easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great for accountability, easy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good- I can’t comment on accuracy very well because I’m using it to track 0% BAC as a tool for accountability with sobriety. Very easy to use, small, and I like the ease of the app. I realize they are gagging my data, but so is nearly everything on a phone... so go ahead- see that I’m sober!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, simple to use, seems accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had two chances to use this so far but have been impressed. It seems pretty accurate based on where reasonable estimate would put me with no erroneous outputs or issues, it’s easy to use, and relatively compact. Would be interesting to compare with another device just to get a second opinion, but I have no reason to believe this one is incorrect. The only problem I see having with it is having friends fight to see who can get the high score! Will likely update this review after further use to add anything else I find.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Van Ryzin

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and discrete!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second breathalyzer i've purchased and I much prefer this one. The app and ability to link to my phone is simple and informative, and the device itself is small, compact, and very discrete. I've only tested it a few times so far but it seems to be accurate. My friends enjoy trying it out too!
customer_reviews.author: Josh T.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but the software needs work
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love the compact size and ease of use, but the app has a lot of bluetooth connection issues. I often have to restart it multiple times to get it to recognize the breathalyzer and then actually let me complete a test. Hopefully with some software updates this can be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Kana

customer_reviews.title: I bought two, and the readings are quite inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, partially because the battery on the first one seemed like it was dying. I have been using the first one for 2 years, and have told tons of people about how great it is. However, when the second one arrived, I decided to test them for consistency in readings. The two devices seem to be not calibrated the same, in that the readings are minimum 30% different. The one seems to undervalue my BAC, and the other one overvalues it. I wanted to give you a much higher score, but sadly I can't.
customer_reviews.author: KirkyJames

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than DUI
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my 32 year old son. He uses it and Uber's if he's over the limit. Might just save his life. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Fauber

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. When using, don't ignore the "Wait 15 minutes after alcohol consumption label." I bought this product in hopes that it was worth it and I would say that it is. Whether your a college student just having fun with your friends or you just want to experiment with your body and alcohol consumption, it's an accurate product thus far. If you don't wait the fifteen minutes it will overestimate​ your intoxication so be sure your last drink was 15 minutes before blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Zaffarano

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, reliable, long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months now and it comes in handy. I don’t use it to judge whether I’m good to drive — if I’m impaired in the slightest I won’t. But it’s a fun party trick. It’s battery lasts a pretty long time. I’ve probably used it a few dozen times and I’ve only charged it once aside from the initial charge. This is good for helping to judge how crappy I’m going to feel in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Jared W.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with android -- buy a standalone unit
customer_reviews.text: Android app does not work. This unit is useless without it.
customer_reviews.author: MATHEW GOEBEL

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and informative. would be a 5 but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and informative. would be a 5 but app does not allow local saving of data, only online. No thanks to online BAC record.
customer_reviews.author: MDRBJR

customer_reviews.title: High accuracy, a bit glitchy.
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent when the mobile app doesn't glitch. Just reset and use it again. No big deal. I like the features the app offers showing more information a simple unit would not supply.
customer_reviews.author: EROK

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy of Results
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This breathalyzer is very consistent but consistently off by a lot. I had 4 bud lights tonight over a 2.5 hour span. Waited 30 min and blew 0.5 BAC. Tried again and exactly the same. Shut it off and waited 10 min, blew 0.5 again. An hour later I'm typing this so obviously I'm not 0.5. This unit is consistently way off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clear superiority
customer_reviews.text: Love the device, love the app. Highly recommend, been using it at my city stomping grounds for months. BACtrack also has a calibration service, so you dont have to worry about regular wear-and-tear on the filter! CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS AMAZING; my BACtrack Mobile arrived without the mouthpieces. I emailed support, and I got a phone call next day, and 10 free mouthpieces the next! Thanks BACtrack!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Rayner

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: As someone who enjoys drinking but also cares about my safety and the safety of others, I do appreciate having this on me. I would rather not drive after having any alcohol, however, its better to know than to not know.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great, small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is very small and sleek looking - comes with a little case, too. A blue light comes on when it's turned on. It doesn't bother me - I actually likes the way it looks - but it does make it more visible. It is easy(and fun) to use. The app is easy to use. You have to link it to a smartphone to get a reading.A friend with asthma couldn't blow long enough to get a reading so that is something to consider. I would imagine it would be the same problem for all breathalyzers, though.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was as described, arrived on time in new condition. This is a great, very small product and work perfectly with the APP. It can fit into a pocket if you would like to do so.
customer_reviews.author: B4Me

customer_reviews.title: Never leave home without, especially when you drink
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that drinks and drives a car should have this device. This little guy will save you a world of hurt in fines, court appearances, insurance surcharges and a criminal record. Check you BAC before you get behind the wheel. Save a life.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bluetooth wireless, but it is a little clunkey to carry around on your keychain
customer_reviews.text: I hope I don't have to fine out the hard way that my number is not the same as a policeman's because I have nothing to compare accuracy, But does help you get a feel for when you are over the limit. I don't necessarily understand the hole social reporting aspect of this, but Facebook shares are there as well as being able to take pictures of your drinks and make notes. If you are doing all of this you are not having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frimming

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It's not something that you could use in a court case but it's a nice way to gauge if you need to wait and drink some water before driving anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: We followed the directions carefully and found the readings can vary wildly from one test to another.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected. Have tried it numerous times just as a test at home and worth every penny. Keep in mind that you can put yourself at risk with even just one drink--if utilizing this to discern if you should drive: don't.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the extra reassurance and building back trust. Was easy for user to set up with android.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to teach people how drunk they really are!!
customer_reviews.text: Has been great to help friends and family learn how few drinks really makes them over legal limit. They thought they were okay but blew .15.
customer_reviews.author: M. Poulson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t guess.
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast it is when warming up, analyzing samples, and giving feedback on the sample. I strongly recommend all my friends have and use one of these regardless of if there are any doubts on if they should drive. I’m not positive on accuracy, but it gives a good idea on where they are at.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, but returned it as i no longer needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, but returned it as i no longer needed it and was a bit turned off by it needing access to my location in order to operate, a little too "big brother".
customer_reviews.author: Jody R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product and a GREAT investment!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing. It's such a great investment. You can always make sure you're okay to drive and it will tell you the time you will be sober. Battery lasts a really long time. I only charged it once and it's been going for 3 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Edit - software is now compatible with my android. As of 9/22/2017, this product's app is not downloadable onto my 7.1.2 Android device, Nexus 6P. The product is useless without connectivity to the app, it seems. Will return unless issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hazelrigg

customer_reviews.title: Accurate product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, worked very well right out of the box. It is super accurate, won't ever go out without it again
customer_reviews.author: Cory A.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and definitely worth it. Better than getting a DUI
customer_reviews.text: What is cheaper? Buying a PBT or getting a DUI and possibly killing someone in a motor vehicle accident? This BACtrack alcohol tester is excellent. It's portable, accurate, rechargeable, comes with 3 mouth pieces, and could save your life or someone else's.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Man

customer_reviews.title: Effective deterrent
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, and from research, is as close to Police Models as a pocketable and portable unit can get. I use it as a reinforcer not to drive after drinking and it serves this purpose well. Email support was prompt and courteous as well (I could not locate the Serial No. to register).
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN D ESPINOZA

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable
customer_reviews.text: Best recent purchase I've made. What a great reality check for me to learn how much I truly am effected by the drinks I've had, and when it's time to give up the keys. Invaluable tool, everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen's reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, mildly inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a number of times, and very convenient and so far not much more than a talking piece. Friends like to use it, but I would not rely on this to make any important decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be spot on and great to know if you should be driving or not. Easy to use and clean. I don't drink mush at all but it is wonderful to prove to others you need to take their car keys. Wish they were around when I was a teen.
customer_reviews.author: nickelman

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Using this breathalyzer is extremely easy. Additionally it is extremely helpful because solely relying on how you feel is not always the best indicator of sobriety. This tool gives you good insight into how sober you are however I would still be cautious in choosing to drive or other activities after having anything to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Has provided me with lots of insight about the metabolism of alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: adman

customer_reviews.title: Compact and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget. Don’t drink much, but good to know after a night of socializing
customer_reviews.author: M Wedeking

customer_reviews.title: Essential item for your glove compartment.
customer_reviews.text: Every glove compartment in every car should have one. Works perfectly. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: naturalrichard

customer_reviews.title: Software is crap.
customer_reviews.text: Ya know... it works fine every once in a blue moon. The program is absute crap. I have a galaxy s10+ with all kinds of fancy Bluetooth connections and this thing will connect maybe 5% of the time. I honestly wouldn't recommend this at all. Pay the same or $20 for a normal one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for one, buy this one
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this thing. It seems to be extremely accurate and I love its interface with the phone. I would definitely recommend it if you need to test your blood alcohol on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Neat device
customer_reviews.text: I mostly bought this thing to play around with. It’s fun and cool to know how alcohol affects your body. The app works well on my iPhone and apple watch
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal product! Why ever question if you are sober enough to drive? It’s not worth the risk. But with BAC track’s breathalyzer you can know for sure every time. And if you aren’t sober enough to drive the Bluetooth app is directly connected to Uber!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Read the directions. You have to wait 15 minutes after eating or drinking to get accuracy. I use it mostly for wine tasting in Napa. But, it's totally fun to breathylize yourself right after a shot of tequila and have the read out tell you "you are unconscious".
customer_reviews.author: scarlett armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product! Such a nifty little tool to help on your night out. The BACTrack Mobile Pro is very easy to use and the phone app is simple to navigate. This device really helps and gives some piece of mind if you’re uncertain about wether or not you’re safe to drive. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Andrzejewski

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and small.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to aim for the high score and i can't remember what happened, all i have is screenshots that say .3
customer_reviews.author: renkylo

customer_reviews.title: Needs better app coding.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect until the update. Now to breathalyze your friends you must go first before it can be switched to friend mode. Everything else is way awesome. Location storing, guesstimate time of soberity. Very cool app I would recommend any drinker to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: James Nino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and use!
customer_reviews.text: Love the app and ease of use. It's super tiny and comes comes in a carrying case. Charging cable doesn't come with the powerbrick, but it's USB Micro, so everyone has one probably
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Pinpoint accurate
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must for anyone who likes to drink. I lost one and was so distraught I bought another. More accurate than your standard car interlock and much more accurate than any other handheld. Ten out of ten
customer_reviews.author: leighton long

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I only had the device for three and half months. I had a couple of beers and a drink, the device is registering no alcohol content. I’m passed my return date. A waste of money
customer_reviews.author: lernard anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy If You Party Rock
customer_reviews.text: The GOAT in Smartphone Breathalyzers. Changed my life. Way less hangovers!
customer_reviews.author: Josey Diaz

customer_reviews.title: great value even after several years owning it!
customer_reviews.text: i’ve had this a few years now, forgot to review it. pretty descent little gadget. super compact so it’s both easy to carry and a fun (informative) party favor.
customer_reviews.author: lisa p

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. I opened the package, and the device has clearly been used, a lot. It is all scratched up and dirty, and you can see dirt/mucus accumulated inside the tube. Not what I was expecting for $99
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. Waited 15 minutes before using, and gave a result. Took a drink of water and did it again, and the results lowered significantly. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bixby

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Drank 5 beers and tested myself an hour later. The reading said i was cstone cold sober. Gave me a .01 reading . Tried again later and got similar readings. Don't waste you money
customer_reviews.author: William Cresci

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no problems there. But dont use it that much and the novelty kind of wore off.
customer_reviews.author: J Cox

customer_reviews.title: Simple Software & Small Size
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to use and has an intuitive app. The small size is perfect for purses or pockets. Comes with three mouth pieces. I have piece of mind know what my BAC level is when I am drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: High quality and accurate. Works smoothly and easily. I've owned a couple of these for fun and this one works the best. Connects via Bluetooth to you phone and Apple Watch. Very consistent as well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Capricaa

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: Terrible accuracy. Any person using this thing can blow a . 2 then blow .4 ten seconds later. I would absolutely not recommend. Spend your money on an analog model and actually have accurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa O.

customer_reviews.title: Seems very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and seems very accurate when used properly
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great tester. like being abe to use the app and track progress of my BAC
customer_reviews.author: DJQuijy

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate. One glass of wine and it Would say I’m dying or near death
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: So painful
customer_reviews.text: Not a great roller at all. Looks good, but super painful and not easy or enjoyable to use.
customer_reviews.author: BKLounge

customer_reviews.title: love it! Fits in ur pocket when u go ...
customer_reviews.text: love it! Fits in ur pocket when u go out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gill

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is very consistent
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for a few months now and it works great. Holds the charge for several days with regular use and has very consistent readings. Definitely a good purchase and a product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The charging cord doesn’t work. Luckily I had a spare micro USB handy
customer_reviews.author: Jack A Lowe,III

customer_reviews.title: Precise product
customer_reviews.text: This product is accurate and quite simple to use. Save yourself from a DUI, this is far cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and right on the money!! Well worth $85 thats for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Rivagirl9

customer_reviews.title: Police grade accuracy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I compared it to an officers breathalyzer and it was right on! I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Got lots of use over the Fourth of July holiday! Easy to use and great app!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a must have for anyone who drinks. Easy to use and helpful to be a safe legal driver.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: it is a valuable tool
customer_reviews.text: good to have when monitoring a recovering alcoholic. Helps back up all persons involved
customer_reviews.author: betty baer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff again from bactrack
customer_reviews.text: This product is simple to use, conveniently sized, and very accurate. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is very accurate. The app glitches every once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable, seems accurate. Easy to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: App is bad
customer_reviews.text: The app constantly times out, takes a really long time to "warm up."
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Loos

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I just relieved this and I have to say that it's a POS. I am not able to hook it up to my phone or even get it on the app. I wish I could give it 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this. It was great while the phone app worked, but worthless now that the app will not start.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good to double check before you get behind the wheel after eating out. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Within 30 seconds it gave me a .2 and a .07.... not sure about how acurate this thing is...
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My state has fairly strict drinking and driving laws. I have often wondered if a single beer at dinner was maybe too much and this has helped me to learn when I may have had too much.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie M.

customer_reviews.title: ... product now for about two weeks so far so good. I like the option to guess your BAC ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product now for about two weeks so far so good. I like the option to guess your BAC before it tells you. Its been eye opening to see how little (in my case) my BAC goes up after one drink versus my partner. I've been doing a lot of research (aka drinking) to test and see what the effects are on my body. My partner and I can each have one drink and our readings are vastly different from each but consistently the same. I would highly recommend this product as it works great, is small and discreet, and being that I'm a tech nerd...I love that it has a phone app.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So fun to know how your affected by how much alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Sayjay76

customer_reviews.title: it is nice to know before you leave a party
customer_reviews.text: Ok, wont hold up in court. However, it is nice to know before you leave a party. A group of about eight of us had a ball with this thing, it makes for a great party trick. We all have a lot riding on our jobs, and a DUI will end our careers. So this little bit of piece of mind helps. I have carried it with me ever since I bought. Almost works like a radar detector, after you buy it, you are immediately more aware of what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far works great. If I test .08 I don't need to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DiGrazia

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Accurate. Quick.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a bunch and it seems very accurate and it's pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hambley

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: A very easy to use and enhances awareness of personal responsibility for drinking and driving.
customer_reviews.author: Travelnguy

product_meta.title: BACtrack Mobile Smartphone Breathalyzer | Professional-Grade Accuracy | Wireless Connectivity to Apple iPhone, Google & Samsung Android Devices | Apple HealthKit Integration
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackOne of the most accurate personal breathalyzers on the market, the award-winning BACtrack Mobile integrates a smartphone and a police-grade breathalyzer to wirelessly bring breath alcohol content (BAC) to your Apple iPhone, Google or Samsung brand Android device. This ultra portable breathalyzer quickly and easily estimates your blood alcohol content, tracks your BAC results over time, and with ZeroLine , estimates when your BAC will return to 0.00%. You can even call an Uber directly from the BACtrack breathalyzer app if you've had too much. Make better decisions while drinking with the innovative and accurate BACtrack Mobile iPhone Breathalyzer.Ideal Uses- Home Breathalyzer- Phone Breathalyzer- Wireless Breathalyzer- Alcohol Detector- Alcohol Monitoring
feature_bullets: #1 RATED SMARTPHONE BREATHALYZER - "Comparing smartphone breathalyzers against the $890 unit used by the California Highway Patrol, only one was spot on with the police-grade model BACtrack Mobile." - The New York Times

ESTIMATE YOUR ALCOHOL LEVEL WITH PRO-GRADE ACCURACY - Powered by BACtrack's patented Xtend Fuel Cell Sensor, BACtrack Mobile utilizes the same professional-grade technology trusted by hospitals, clinics, and even law enforcement.
KNOW WHEN YOUR BAC WILL RETURN TO 0.00% - BACtrack's innovative ZeroLine technology estimates the time until your BAC is 0.00%, allowing you to make better decisions while drinking.
CALL AN UBER - Remember, the only safe time to drive is when your BACtrack shows 0.00%. Anything above that? You can call an Uber directly from the App.

ONE YEAR WARRANTY - If during the first year of operation any unit ceases to function properly, we will repair or replace the defective product at no charge ***when purchased from an authorized retailer***

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
